entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 60%
